PAD_FoundKey.synopsis: Lines spoken when the player spots a key in the undergrowth near a tollhouse. Different variations depending on what the player already knows about the key.

PAD_GnollsDead.synopsis: Player comment spoken when seeing a pack of dead gnolls

AD_Refugees.synopsis: Dialogue between two refugees who are secretly cultists of Zariel. This dialogue is spoken before the player enters the tollhouse where they are hiding out. If a player enters during the dialogue, they stop talking to address the newcomer.

PAD_CorpseSmell.synopsis: Player characters comment on smelling and seeing a decomposing corpse when entering the cellar of a tollhouse.

AD_RefugeeGreeting.synopsis: A warm greeting as players enter the tollhouse controlled by the faux-paladin's group

AD_RefugeeAlarm.synopsis: A paladin calls to their companions when they see hostile players.

PAD_FoundKey_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundKey_0.text: A key. Wonder what it opens?

PAD_FoundKey_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundKey_1.text: The corpse mentioned a key... this must be the one.

PAD_FoundKey_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundKey_2.text: A key - it might open the tollhouse vault.

PAD_GnollsDead_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GnollsDead_0.text: Whatever killed those gnolls might be nearby. Careful.

AD_Refugees_2.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees_2.text: Cut it out. There's worse than gnolls out there.
AD_Refugees_2.context: NodeContext: admonishing a companion, but in a friendly way

AD_Refugees_4.speaker: Trynn
AD_Refugees_4.text: Nothing we need to worry about.

AD_Refugees_3.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees_3.text: How about a dragon? Would that worry you?
AD_Refugees_3.context: NodeContext: trying to get a rise out of a companion

AD_Refugees_0.speaker: Trynn
AD_Refugees_0.text: I'd give it a bloody good fight, that's for sure.

AD_Refugees_1.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees_1.text: Ha! Only thing you'd give a dragon is bad gas.

PAD_CorpseSmell_0.speaker: Player
PAD_CorpseSmell_0.text: Ugh, that stench. Body must have been here a good while.
PAD_CorpseSmell_0.context: NodeContext: just entered a cellar where a decomposing corpse is creating a horrible stench - disgusted

PAD_CorpseSmell_1.speaker: Player
PAD_CorpseSmell_1.context: NodeContext: just entered a cellar where a decomposing corpse is creating a horrible stench - disgusted

AD_RefugeeGreeting_0.speaker: Anders
AD_RefugeeGreeting_0.text: At ease, friend. You're welcome to rest here.
AD_RefugeeGreeting_0.context: NodeContext: warm greeting as players enter a building where this man's companions are resting

AD_RefugeeAlarm_0.context: NodeContext: Calling for help to companions nearby
